rulesStrings.li: questName->Explore damaged ancient grain farm
questDescription->You learned that an ancient building has been discovered nearby, which is said to be an ancient grain farm. You can break into it to obtain loot.

li.label: Quest expired: [resolvedQuestName]
li.text: Intercepted communications indicated that supplies inside the farm had been looted by others. The quest [resolvedQuestName] has expired.

rulesStrings.li: questName->Explore damaged ancient grain farm
questDescription->You learned that an ancient building has been discovered nearby, which is said to be an ancient grain farm. You can break into it to obtain loot.

li.label: Quest expired: [resolvedQuestName]
li.text: Intercepted communications indicated that supplies inside the farm had been looted by others. The quest [resolvedQuestName] has expired.

rulesStrings.li: questName->Explore damaged ancient cotton farm
questDescription(askerIsNull==true)->You learned that an ancient building has been discovered nearby, which is said to be an ancient cotton farm. You can break into it to obtain loot
questDescription->[asker_nameDef] told us that [asker_pronoun] discovered an ancient cotton farm. \n[asker_pronoun] wanted us to go ahead and investigate and address any potential threats.

li.label: Quest expired: [resolvedQuestName]
li.text: Intercepted communications indicated that supplies inside the farm had been looted by others. The quest [resolvedQuestName] has expired.

rulesStrings.li: questName->Explore damaged ancient devilstrand cotton farm
questDescription(askerIsNull==true)->You learned that an ancient building has been discovered nearby, which is said to be an ancient devilstrand cotton farm. You can break into it to obtain loot.
questDescription->[asker_nameDef] told us that [asker_pronoun] discovered an ancient devilstrand cotton farm. \n[asker_pronoun] wants us to assist in the investigation.

li.label: Quest expired: [resolvedQuestName]
li.text: Intercepted communications indicated that supplies inside the farm had been looted by others. The quest [resolvedQuestName] has expired.

rulesStrings.li: questName(priority=1)->Explore discarded nutrient cream factory
questDescription(askerIsNull==true)->You learned that an ancient building has been discovered nearby, which is said to be an ancient nutrient cream factory. You can break into it to obtain loot.

questDescription->Some distant noises made [asker_nameDef] notice an ancient building that looked like an abandoned factory. \n[asker_nameDef] wanted us to investigate the factory and [asker_pronoun] thought there might be some unknown threats inside the building.

li.label: Quest expired: [resolvedQuestName]
li.text: Intercepted communications indicated that supplies inside the factory had been looted by others. The quest [resolvedQuestName] has expired.

rulesStrings.li: questName->Explore discarded nutrient solution factory
questDescription(askerIsNull==true)->You learned that an ancient building has been discovered nearby, which is said to be an ancient nutrient solution factory. You can break into it to obtain loot.

questDescription->[asker_nameDef] told us that [asker_pronoun] had discovered an ancient nutrient solution factory on his trade route, and [asker_pronoun] was worried that his trade security would be threatened, so [asker_pronoun] hoped that we would go and solve it.

li.label: Quest expired: [resolvedQuestName]
li.text: Intercepted communications indicated that supplies inside the factory had been looted by others. The quest [resolvedQuestName] has expired.

rulesStrings.li: questName->Explore Hidden ancient hydroponic farm
questDescription(askerIsNull==true)->You learned that an ancient building has been discovered nearby, which is said to be an hidden ancient hydroponic farm. You can break into it to obtain loot.

questDescription->[asker_nameDef] has discovered a intact ancient agricultural site, which is located in a very hidden location and may contain some ancient agricultural technology.\n\n[asker_nameDef] hopes that we can go to that facility to obtain some relevant technology.

li.label: Quest expired: [resolvedQuestName]
li.text: Intercepted communications indicated that supplies inside the farm had been looted by others. The quest [resolvedQuestName] has expired.

rulesStrings.li: questName->Occupied ancient grain farm

questDescription->[asker_nameDef] tells you that an ancient grain farm has been discovered nearby, and [siteFaction_name] are stationed inside, seemingly treating it as an agricultural military composite stronghold.\n This stronghold poses a serious threat to the security of the surrounding area. [asker_nameDef] hopes that we can completely eliminate the enemies inside.

li.label: Quest failed: [resolvedQuestName]
li.text: You failed to complete the occupied grain farm mission,[siteFaction_name] move their stronghold to a more secluded location, and you lose all information about their stronghold.

li.customLetterText: You have defeated the grain farm!\n\nThe payment from [asker_faction_name] has arrived.

rulesStrings.li: questName->Occupied ancient grain farm

questDescription->Recently, you have noticed abnormal activities of hostile forces nearby. They seem to be dispatching troops to an unknown ancient building. Your informant told you that it is an ancient grain farm, and the appearance of such enemy strongholds near your base makes you feel uneasy. Perhaps it is time to eliminate them.

li.label: Quest failed: [resolvedQuestName]
li.text: You failed to complete the occupied grain farm mission,[siteFaction_name] move their stronghold to a more secluded location, and you lose all information about their stronghold.

li.customLetterText: You have defeated the grain farm!\n\nThe payment has arrived.

rulesStrings.li: questName->Occupied ancient cotton farm

questDescription->[asker_nameDef] told you that an ancient cotton farm occupied by hostile forces has been discovered nearby. \n[siteFaction_name] are building a defensive fortification, which poses a serious threat to [asker_faction_name] trade security. \n[asker_nameDef] hopes that we can completely eliminate the enemies inside.

li.label: Quest failed: [resolvedQuestName]
li.text: You failed to complete the occupied cotton farm mission,[siteFaction_name] move their stronghold to a more secluded location, and you lose all information about their stronghold.

li.customLetterText: You have defeated the ancient cotton farm!\n\nThe payment from [asker_faction_name] has arrived.

rulesStrings.li: questName->Occupied ancient cotton farm

questDescription->Recently, you have noticed abnormal activities of hostile forces nearby. They seem to be building defensive fortifications on an ancient cotton farm. This behavior indicates the arrival of an invasion, and perhaps it is time to strike first.

li.label: Quest failed: [resolvedQuestName]
li.text: You failed to complete the occupied grain farm mission,[siteFaction_name] move their stronghold to a more secluded location, and you lose all information about their stronghold.

li.customLetterText: You have defeated the grain farm!\n\nThe payment has arrived.

rulesStrings.li: questName->Occupied devilstrand cotton farm

questDescription->[asker_nameDef] tells you that [asker_pronoun] has found an abandoned monorail system, and on the track route, [asker_pronoun] has discovered an ancient Devilstrand farm occupied by [siteFaction_name]. [siteFaction_name] have established complete defensive fortifications and turret groups on the outskirts of the farm.\n This behavior is equivalent to declaring war. [asker_nameDef] has attempted to attack but suffered heavy losses. [asker_pronoun] hopes that we can pull out this heavily armed stronghold and avenge [asker_factionName] soldiers.

li.label: Quest failed: [resolvedQuestName]
li.text: You failed to complete the occupied devilstrand cotton farm mission,[siteFaction_name] blew up the monorail system and destroyed known roads.

li.customLetterText: You have defeated the devilstrand cotton farm!\n\nThe payment from [asker_faction_name] has arrived.

rulesStrings.li: questName->Occupied devilstrand cotton farm

questDescription->Our informant found an abandoned ancient monorail train system, with its end leading to a Devilstrand farm occupied by hostile forces. The informant told us that the hostile forces have built complete defense lines and terrifying turret groups on the outskirts of the farm. And often, some Devilstrands are transported out of the farm, and hostile forces seem to have been stationed here to produce Devilstrands. It's time to take action against them.

li.label: Quest failed: [resolvedQuestName]
li.text: You failed to complete the occupied devilstrand cotton farm mission,[siteFaction_name] blew up the monorail system and destroyed known roads.

li.customLetterText: You have defeated the grain farm!\n\nThe payment has arrived.
